messages.message: Hi, Can we allow these project explorer toolbar to be pinned. It's a bit annoying when you are working through multiple projects to hover over to make things visible (since it always goes back to un-expanded position). Thanks !
are you trying to navigate to different projects? or are you trying to click the settings/edit/delete buttons in this sidebar?
Yeah was trying to delete a bunch of projects.
ah i see, yes the UI is definitely not designed for bulk deleting a lot of projects :disappointed:

I think user experience perspective as well, this auto un-expand seems overdone and distracting. It's a better user experience if the explorer is static and giving user to hide (or unhide). That's what most of the software products do.

yes, we do have a better sidebar for workspaces in the new UI that replaces “My Hub”

that sidebar does what you’re describing - ie allow the user to click a button to expand/collapse
